metadata.title: CVE-2011-0704 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: 389 Directory Server 1.2.7.5, when built with mozldap, allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (replica crash) by sending an emptymodify request.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
